definition: a round fruit with shiny red or green skin and firm white flesh
a long curved fruit with a thick yellow skin and soft flesh, that grows on trees in hot countries
to stop something from having any effect
a large fish with silver skin and pink flesh that is used for food. Salmon live in the ocean but swim up rivers to lay their eggs
(of a thing) large and difficult to move or carry. (of a person) tall and heavy
wordOfMotherLanguage: かさばった、(重さの割には)大きい
